item.title: The Two Billion Towers of Time
item.description: When the final tower is completed, time will overflow. This animation counts down to the Epochalypse by displaying the current Unix time as progress in solving a 31 level Tower of Hanoi. Unix Time Unix time is the number of seconds which have passed since midnight UTC, January 1, 1970, the Unix epoch. Computers use Unix time internally to store when an event occurred as a single number. Unlike regular1 timestamps, Unix timestamps are never repeated or skipped.
